Settings Welcome to The Eddie Bull Cupcakes App where you will find most delicious cupcakes Give us a call View on map Our company Eddie-Bull Cupcakes has been around since late 2016. We specialize in strictly cupcakes, and currently have over 10 different cupcakes. Our signature being the Triple-Choco, which is our favourite as well! We just opened our first store in the cafeteria in St. Clair College. Stop buy a recieve a 10% student discount with a valid student card!
